name: Meleer
description:
Melee your way through difficult waves of enemies in a topdown perspective.

Use your three different skills to get through the waves of enemies.

Use your primary and secondary skills to deal damage to your enemies. The primary skill slices infront of you while the secondary skill spins and deals damage around you.

Your dash skill lets you close distance to your enemies, avoid them or avoid their skills.

Get experience by killing enemies and level up by obtaining enough experience. Every time you level up you get to choose one of a few upgrades for your character, this will help you get through the waves as each wave has an increased difficulty.
